Restraint On Alienation.definition: something that serves to prevent a party from alienating property ;specif

1.1: something that serves to prevent a party from alienating property

2.1: a provision in an instrument (as a deed or will) that purports to prohibit or penalize the use of the power of alienation
2.note: Though not necessarily unlawful, restraints on alienation are disfavored in the law.
